EXTRACTED VALUE: Harnessing the new console's power, this Revenge makes online showdowns much more personal.
Never have I seen a concept so perfectly implemented that a relatively tiny patch of land has me utterly captivated. [Jan. 2007, p.60]
Not only is this the best first-person adventure I've played but it's the most brutal, skillfully detailed and paced as well. [Apr 2008, p.50]
Like a huge toybox full of rotting flesh and ridiculous attention to detail. Just brilliant. [Oct 2006, p.72]
As you play the game you just can’t help dropping your jaw in amazement at what you’re seeing and getting to do.
The game is the deepest and most exciting to date of all the freewheeling street shooter games. There are missions and activities galore.
